Notes.Text:
This update for php7 fixes the following issues:

- fix CVE-2020-7068 [bsc#1175223]: Use of freed hash key in the phar_parse_zipfile function
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: In PHP versions 7.2.x below 7.2.33, 7.3.x below 7.3.21 and 7.4.x below 7.4.9, while processing PHAR files using phar extension, phar_parse_zipfile could be tricked into accessing freed memory, which could lead to a crash or information disclosure.
